channel.title: Help!
channel.description: when peoples login to my server and sometimes get connection lost they get logged out.and then when they try to log in again the get rejected.and they client says "no response from server" and when they restarts client they can't even login and then i need to restart server...what i should do to stop this?[sorry for my bad english i am from lithuania][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 11:28:13 AM[/size][hr]plz help someone

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @inuyama2 inuyama2
item.description:
@inuyama2 wrote:

when peoples login to my server and sometimes get connection lost they get logged out.and then when they try to log in again the get rejected.and they client says “no response from server” and when they restarts client they can’t even login and then i need to restart server…what i should do to stop this?[sorry for my bad english i am from lithuania][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 11:28:13 AM[/size][hr]plz help someone
